author: wpcarvalho
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is intended to fix syntax errors found in PPS XML files.

#### PR validation:

Simple validation by building geometry with the fixed files and dumping pot and sensor positions. All as expected.

- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: PPS XML files fixes
